text: Aasara pension is a pension scheme by the Government of Telangana. It is a welfare scheme of pensions to old people, widows, Goud community, elephantiasis patients, AIDS afflicted people, physically disabled and beedi workers.Aasara Pensions in Bangaru Telangana By March 2018, the number of beneficiaries stood at 42 lakhs.40 lakh pensioners under 'Aasara Pension Scheme' in Telangana ==History== The pension scheme was started in 8 November 2014 by Chief Minister of Telangana, Kalvakuntla Chandrashekhar Rao in Kothur in Mahboobnagar district.Aasara Pension Scheme Government: Over 24 lakh people to benefit from Telangana government's Aasara Pension Scheme - The Economic Times The government is spending ₹5,500 crore every year on the scheme. ==The scheme== The new Pension scheme called Aasara increasing the monthly pension from ₹200 to ₹1000 for old age persons, widows, weavers, toddy tappers and AIDS patients. The government also extended the financial assistance to ₹ 1000 per month to the poor Beedi worker under Aasara Scheme from the month of March 2015 onwards. ===Disabled people=== The pension was increased by ₹500 to ₹1500 for disabled persons.and also disabled percentage set to 70% minimum ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Government welfare schemes in Telangana Category:Government of Telangana Category:KCR Government initiatives
